alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 22 at 8:53PM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Northwest wind frequently gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From midnight to 6 PM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Backcountry enthusiasts, including snowmobilers, can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
